resources.string: This section shows the titles of the books we have in the database sorted alphabetically by title
This section shows the information of all the books we have in the database sorted by category

In this section you can view the data of the books written by a user-searched author. In order to perform the search, we will have to enter the name of the author in the text field and press the Search button

In this section you can add new books to the database. To do this, we will have to press the button with the "+" symbol at the bottom right of the screen. Once the data of the new book is entered, and if everything went correctly, we will see that the new book has been added

In this section we can remove the books that we no longer want from the database. Initially, all the books that appear in the list will be published. To delete a book, you must click on the item and confirm the action. We can also search for a book by title and then click on the card that contains the data of the book to delete. After a confirmation, the book will be deleted, although this action can be undone if we click on "Undo" when this option appears

In this section we can change the personal valuation of the books we have in the database. To do this, we will simply click on the book we want to change, and we will see a window to enter the new rating. Subsequently, if we confirm the action, we will see that our personal assessment of the book has been updated
